verbose_text: Abeta may promote synaptic glutamate release XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR or impair glutamate reuptake XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR, which indirectly leads to aberrant NMDA receptor activation, especially of extrasynaptic GluN2B NMDA receptors XREF_BIBR.
evidence: NMDA receptor activation, especially of extrasynaptic GluN2B
